title: Profile Management - Update Profile Information
description: Verify that users can update their profile information including name, description, and avatar image, and changes are reflected immediately in the live preview.

steps.description: Open Onelink application and navigate to profile management section.
Input valid name, description, and upload a valid avatar image.
Verify that the input fields accept the changes.
Confirm the live preview updates immediately to reflect the new profile information.

title: Profile Management - Empty and Special Character Inputs
description: Verify the system handles empty and special character inputs correctly for profile fields and updates the live preview accordingly.

steps.description: Clear the name and description fields and remove the avatar image.
Verify the system accepts empty fields if allowed or provides appropriate validation messages.
Input special characters and unicode emojis into name and description fields.
Confirm that the live preview correctly renders or sanitizes the special characters without errors.

title: Social Links Management - Add and Edit Multiple Platform Links
description: Verify users can add, edit, and configure social media links across different platforms, and changes reflect instantly in live preview.

steps.description: Navigate to social links management section.
Add valid URLs for multiple supported social media platforms (e.g., Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram).
Verify the links are accepted and displayed properly in the input fields.
Edit existing social media URLs to new valid addresses.
Confirm live preview updates to reflect the updated social links instantly.

title: Social Links Management - Invalid URL Input Handling
description: Verify that invalid or malformed social media URLs are detected and appropriate error messages are displayed without updating live preview.

steps.description: Input invalid URLs (e.g., missing protocol, invalid domain) in social links.
Verify that validation error messages appear for invalid URLs.
Confirm that the live preview does not update with invalid social links.

title: Custom Links Management - Add, Edit, Delete, and Reorder Links
description: Verify users can add new custom links, edit existing ones, delete links, and reorder them using drag-and-drop with live preview updating accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to custom links management panel.
Add multiple custom links with valid URLs and descriptive labels.
Verify each added link appears in the list and updates the live preview.
Edit an existing custom link's label and URL.
Confirm changes are saved and reflected in the live preview.
Delete a custom link from the list.
Verify the link is removed from the list and the live preview updates accordingly.
Perform drag-and-drop reordering of custom links.
Confirm the new order is saved and the live preview displays the reordered links.

title: Custom Links Management - Handling Invalid Inputs
description: Verify form validation prevents adding or editing custom links with invalid URLs, empty labels, or missing fields.

steps.description: Try to add a custom link with empty label and valid URL.
Check for validation error preventing submission.
Try to add a custom link with valid label but invalid URL format.
Check for URL format validation errors.
Try editing an existing link to have empty or invalid values.
Verify appropriate validation errors are displayed and changes are not saved.

title: Live Preview - Real-Time Update Accuracy
description: Verify that any change made to profile, social links, or custom links is instantly and accurately reflected in the live preview without delay or errors.

steps.description: Make changes in profile inputs such as name, description, avatar.
Live preview updates immediately and displays the new profile data correctly.
Add, edit, or delete social media links.
Confirm live preview updates accurately to match social links changes.
Modify custom links including adding, deleting, editing, and reordering.
Verify live preview reflects the changes instantaneously without errors.

title: URL-based Data Storage - Encode and Preserve Data
description: Verify that all user data including profile information, social links, and custom links are correctly encoded into the URL, and reloaded properly after page refresh or URL sharing.

steps.description: Fill profile, social links, and custom links with valid data.
Observe the URL and copy it.
Reload the page using the copied URL.
Verify all form fields are populated with the saved data from the URL.
Confirm the live preview matches the restored data exactly.

title: URL-based Data Storage - Large Data Size and Edge Cases
description: Test the system's ability to handle large amounts of data encoded in the URL and edge cases such as special characters and maximum field lengths.

steps.description: Input very large profile descriptions and many social and custom links close to typical URL length limits.
Check the URL generation and encoding.
Verify that the URL correctly encodes the full data without truncation or corruption.
Reload using the long URL.
Verify all data is restored correctly without loss.

title: Responsive Layout - Adaptation on Various Screen Sizes
description: Verify the three-column layout (left input panel, right preview panel) adapts gracefully to desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes without breaking usability or visual quality.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop resolution and verify three-column layout.
Check all UI elements are visible and appropriately sized.
Resize viewport to tablet size.
Verify layout adjusts without overlapping elements and remains functional.
Resize viewport to mobile screen size.
Check layout stacks or adjusts columns to suit small screen, with clear visible UI and preview.

title: Demo Data Templates - Load and Apply Template Content
description: Verify users can select various predefined demo templates (AI, education, finance, news, productivity, health, tools) and that the form fields and live preview populate correctly.

steps.description: Open demo templates selection.
Select each demo template one by one.
Verify form fields populate with the respective template data.
Confirm live preview updates to display the template's appearance and content.

title: Form Components - Reusability and Consistency
description: Verify reusable form components function consistently across different forms and pages maintaining UI/UX standards and handling inputs correctly.

steps.description: Inspect usage of reusable form components in profile, social links, and custom links forms.
Confirm components render consistently with expected style and behavior.
Test form input validations and interactions within reusable components.
Verify validation messages, loading indicators, dividers, and input behaviors work as expected across forms.
